body: Title. Woop. What might people want to ask me, I wonder.
body_tagged: Title. Woop. What might people want to ask me, I wonder.
title: AMA Because yay

replies.body:
Hi
Where do you live? What is your real name? Favourite food? Favourite drink? Favourite animal? Favourite fruit? Favourite colour? Favourite Avicus Map? How did you find Avicus? Opinions on me?
replies.body_tagged:
Hi
Where do you live? What is your real name? Favourite food? Favourite drink? Favourite animal? Favourite fruit? Favourite colour? Favourite Avicus Map? How did you find Avicus? Opinions on me?

replies.body:
I live in Texas. My name is Noah. I like steak. My favorite drink is probably vanilla coke. I like both cats and dogs, rip. I guess banana is my favorite fruit? Favorite color is cyan. Uhh, I'll scapegoat and say I like a few equally. Don't make me butcher the names please! ;w;
And I think you're cool, you've been pretty nice to me. Good at the game, and pvp. I see you around a lot! Haha.

replies.body:
I thought you were Asian or something. 

Anyways, hi I'm Google, have you ever changed your name before? 
You like Texas? Have you ever seen someone famous? What's your dream job?
replies.body_tagged:

You like Texas? Have you ever seen someone famous? What's your dream job?

replies.body:
On Minecraft? Yeah, I was Darklight55z for a while. This username is what that one originated from though. Texas is alright, I don't like the heat much. But I also dislike the cold so I'm screwed either way I supposee. I haven't really seen anyone famous, unless you count 'YouTube famous'. xD
I don't have any particular aspirations in careers right now. It's not very good. Maybe one day!
